option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.CsgoItemsApp"> <activity android:name=".ui.main.MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.CsgoItemsApp"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<!-- Crate detail activity --> <activity android:name=".ui.detail.CrateDetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:label="Crate" /> </application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" package="br.com.guedes.csgoitemsapp">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.CsgoItemsApp"> <activity android:name=".ui.main.MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.CsgoItemsApp"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<!-- Crate detail activity --> <activity android:name=".ui.detail.CrateDetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:label="Crate" />
<!-- Item detail (skins/stickers/highlights) --> <activity android:name=".ui.detail.DetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:label="Detail" />
<!-- Agent detail activity --> <activity android:name=".ui.detail.AgentDetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:label="Agent" /> </application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
package br.com.guedes.csgoitemsapp.model
import java.io.Serializable
data class Rarity( val id: String?, val name: String?, val color: String? ) : Serializable
data class CollectionInfo( val id: String?, val name: String?, val image: String? ) : Serializable
data class TeamInfo( val id: String?, val name: String? ) : Serializable
// Agent model matching the API sample data class Agent( val id: String, val name: String?, val description: String?, val rarity: Rarity? = null, val collections: List<CollectionInfo>? = null, val team: TeamInfo? = null, val market_hash_name: String? = null, val image: String? = null ) : Serializable

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/background_dark_blue">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivAgent" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:adjustViewBounds="true" android:maxWidth="360dp" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:contentDescription="@string/img_detail_desc" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<View android:id="@+id/viewRarityColor" android:layout_width="12dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:background="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvRarityName" style="@style/Detail.SubTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAgentName" style="@style/Detail.Title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAgentMarket" style="@style/Detail.SubTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAgentDescription" style="@style/Detail.Body" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/llCollections" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAgentTeam" style="@style/Detail.SubTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgCrateHeader" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/img_detail_desc" tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCrateName" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="22sp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<!-- Back button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btnCrateBack" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/back" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCrateType" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCrateDescription" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/contains" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerContains" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/contains_rare" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerRare" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/background_dark_blue">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgCrateHeader" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:adjustViewBounds="true" android:maxWidth="360dp" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:contentDescription="@string/img_detail_desc" tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCrateName" style="@style/Detail.Title" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCrateType" style="@style/Detail.SubTitle" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCrateDescription" style="@style/Detail.Body" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView style="@style/Detail.SectionHeader" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/contains" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerContains" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView style="@style/Detail.SectionHeader" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/contains_rare" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerRare" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgDetail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/img_detail_desc" tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
<!-- PlayerView ExoPlayer para highlights --> <com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui.PlayerView android:id="@+id/playerView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:use_controller="true" />
<!-- ProgressBar para indicar buffering/loading do player --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/playerProgress" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<!-- Back button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/back" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDetailName" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="20sp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDetailSub" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDescription" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExtraSummary" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/background_dark_blue">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgDetail" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:adjustViewBounds="true" android:maxWidth="360dp" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:contentDescription="@string/img_detail_desc" tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
<!-- PlayerView ExoPlayer para highlights --> <com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui.PlayerView android:id="@+id/playerView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:use_controller="true" />
<!-- ProgressBar para indicar buffering/loading do player --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/playerProgress" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDetailName" style="@style/Detail.Title" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDetailSub" style="@style/Detail.SubTitle" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvDescription" style="@style/Detail.Body" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExtraSummary" style="@style/Detail.SubTitle" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".ui.main.MainActivity">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:id="@+id/appBarLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentTop="true">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" app:title="CS:GO Items" app:titleTextColor="@android:color/white" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.SearchView android:id="@+id/searchView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:queryHint="Search by name..." />
</com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_below="@id/appBarLayout" android:layout_above="@+id/bottom_navigation" />
<com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/bottom_navigation" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:background="@drawable/bottom_nav_bg" app:itemIconTint="@color/bottom_nav_color" app:itemTextColor="@color/bottom_nav_color" app:menu="@menu/bottom_nav_menu" />
</RelativeLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".ui.main.MainActivity">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:id="@+id/appBarLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentTop="true">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" app:title="" app:titleTextColor="@android:color/white" />
</com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_below="@id/appBarLayout" android:layout_above="@+id/bottom_navigation" />
<com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/bottom_navigation" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:background="@drawable/bottom_nav_bg" app:itemIconTint="@color/bottom_nav_color" app:itemTextColor="@color/bottom_nav_color" app:menu="@menu/bottom_nav_menu" app:itemIconSize="28dp" app:labelVisibilityMode="labeled" />
</RelativeLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/dialog_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Filtrar por:" android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Large" />
<RadioGroup android:id="@+id/filter_options_group" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/clear_filter_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Limpar Filtro" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_item" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:scaleType="centerInside" tools:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_background" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:maxLines="1" android:ellipsize="end" android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBody2" tools:text="Item Name" />
<View android:id="@+id/rarity_indicator" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="4dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" tools:background="#4b69ff"/>
</LinearLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background_dark">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_item" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:scaleType="centerInside" tools:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_background" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBody2" android:textColor="@color/text_primary_dark" tools:text="Item Name" />
<View android:id="@+id/rarity_indicator" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="4dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" tools:background="#4b69ff"/>
</LinearLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgContain" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/img_detail_desc" />
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvContainName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvContainRarity" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="8dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgContain" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/img_detail_desc" />
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvContainName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/text_primary_dark" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvContainRarity" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary_dark"/>
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <item android:id="@+id/nav_skins" android:title="@string/nav_skins" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_stickers" android:title="@string/nav_stickers" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_highlights" android:title="@string/nav_highlights" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_crates" android:title="@string/nav_crates" /> </menu>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <item android:id="@+id/nav_skins" android:icon="@drawable/ic_skin_colored" android:title="@string/nav_skins" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_stickers" android:icon="@drawable/ic_sticker_colored" android:title="@string/nav_stickers" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_highlights" android:icon="@drawable/ic_highlight_colored" android:title="@string/nav_highlights" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_crates" android:icon="@drawable/ic_crate_colored" android:title="@string/nav_crates" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_agents" android:icon="@drawable/ic_agent_colored" android:title="@string/nav_agents" /> </menu>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto">
<item android:id="@+id/action_search" android:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_search" android:title="@string/search_hint_skins" app:actionViewClass="androidx.appcompat.widget.SearchView" app:showAsAction="ifRoom|collapseActionView" />
<item android:id="@+id/action_filter" android:icon="@drawable/ic_filter_list" android:title="Filter" app:showAsAction="ifRoom" /> </menu>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color> <color name="nav_active">#FF00BCD4</color> <color name="nav_inactive">#80FFFFFF</color> <color name="color_skin">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="color_sticker">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="color_highlight">#FFFFC107</color> <color name="color_crate">#FF4CAF50</color> <color name="color_agent">#FFD32CE6</color> <color name="background_dark_blue">#0D1117</color> <color name="text_primary_dark">#FFFFFFFF</color> <color name="text_secondary_dark">#B0BEC5</color> <color name="card_background_dark">#161B22</color> <color name="header_dark_blue">#161B22</color> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources> <string name="app_name">CsgoItemsApp</string> <string name="nav_skins">Skins</string> <string name="nav_stickers">Stickers</string> <string name="nav_highlights">Highlights</string> <string name="nav_crates">Crates</string> <string name="img_detail_desc">Item image</string> <string name="contains">Contains</string> <string name="contains_rare">Contains (Rare)</string> <string name="back">Back</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources> <string name="app_name">CS:GO Itens</string> <string name="nav_skins">Skins</string> <string name="nav_stickers">Adesivos</string> <string name="nav_highlights">Destaques</string> <string name="nav_crates">Caixas</string> <string name="nav_agents">Agentes</string> <string name="img_detail_desc">Imagem do item</string> <string name="contains">Contém</string> <string name="contains_rare">Contém (Raro)</string> <string name="back">Voltar</string> <string name="search_hint_skins">Pesquisar Skins…</string> <string name="search_hint_stickers">Pesquisar Adesivos…</string> <string name="search_hint_highlights">Pesquisar Destaques…</string> <string name="search_hint_crates">Pesquisar Caixas…</string> <string name="search_hint_agents">Pesquisar Agentes…</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources>
<!-- Text Styles --> <style name="Detail.Title" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:textSize">24sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary_dark</item> </style>
<style name="Detail.SubTitle" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:textSize">16sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_secondary_dark</item> </style>
<style name="Detail.Body" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:textSize">16sp</item> <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary_dark</item> </style>
<style name="Detail.SectionHeader" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:textSize">18sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:layout_marginTop">16dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">8dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary_dark</item> </style>
</resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<style name="Theme.CsgoItemsApp" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar" /> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.CsgoItemsApp" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/header_dark_blue</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/header_dark_blue</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_700</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> <item name="android:windowBackground">@color/background_dark_blue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/text_primary_dark</item> <item name="android:textColorSecondary">@color/text_secondary_dark</item> </style>
</resources>
